charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the US Bureau of prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 42 months; that the sentence be served in a minimum security facility; Upon release from imprisonment the defendant shall be on supervised release fo r a term of 36 months; the defendant shall not possess a firearm etc. the defendant shall not open any new lines of credit without approval of the probation department; the defendant shall provide the jprobation department with any requested financia l information; the defendant shall notify the US Attorney within 30 days of any change of address; Standard conditions of supervision...
